description:
Enter your date for the day- Roscoe. He is a beefy straight guy, who totally LOVED showing off for his audience. He is a natural exhibitionist, so I think he had a lot of fun jerking for everyone.
Not sure how I would categorize his personality, but visually and a bit mentally, he reminds me of a frat dude who made sure the party got started. Always ready with a bottle of liquor or a keg of beer. Not a party animal, but more like a party instigator!
He likes all kinds of women, which basically made the solo very easy. He picked the first girl I put on for him, and stuck with her. Not sure he paid much attention to the video until it was time to nut.
He seems like a "Solo Only" type of guy, so not sure he will be back for more. He sure has exhibitionist written all over him!
title: Roscoe - Solo
